column5: According to the video 11:23 pm Wed. May 4th two people stole my canoe from the Caledonia Auto Body property. This canoe was there for a repair and paint.  If anyone knows or hears of the two that did this theft please inform them that I would like it returned. They can drop it off in the same place, no questions asked.....or I can turn the video over to the police.....the one where you looked directly into the camera.  Dan
It may help if you post some specifics about the canoe.

Turn the video into the police, now. You may not get your canoe back even if they are convicted. I think both you and I know where it is most likely. My wife works in Caledonia and I'm surprised her car hasn't been stolen yet. Average of 1 vehicle a year is taken from their parking lot on Argyle in broad daylight, the main street in town. Sick pricks.
I can't see the picture.  I hope you get your canoe back.
A Judge might frown on you trying to make a deal with a thief and not order restitution. Call the cops.
The police don't really do much in that neck of the woods, I'd say post the video here as a long shot to get your canoe back
The shop should have insurance to cover that.

The shop should have insurance to cover that.  Deductible might be more than the canoe is worth. Depends on the policy of course, but on a commercial property a $5k deductible is fairly common.  That said, if the shop took it in for work, they are responsible for it.
